DOC.brief_summary: This dose-finding study evaluate change weight 24 week treatment 8 different dos LIK066 compare placebo obese overweight adult , follow 24 week treatment 2 dos LIK066 placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Change Weight After 24 Weeks Treatment With LIK066 Obese Overweight Adults
DOC.criteria: 1. informed consent 2 . ( BMI > =30 ) ( BMI > =27 history CV disease , hypertension , dyslipidemia , prediabetes type 2 diabetes mellitus , sleepapnea syndrome ) 3. willing comply lifestyle intervention treatment full duration study ( approximately 54 week ) Hypersensitivity study medication Pregnancy lactate woman History malignancy Use pharmacologically active weight loss product Bariatric surgery Ketoacidosis , lactic acidosis , hyperosmolar coma 6 month screen visit . HbA1c > 10 % screen visit .
